nodes.bodyText: take note that I just added tests and docs.
I see your point. I can filter out non-package dirs.

What about allowing wildcards for packages if the wildcard ends in /? Then you could do -namesection: javax.*/;sealed=true. I can see that you do not want wildcards not ending in slash to apply to package entries. But I also think we should support wildcards ending in slash to apply to matching package entries?
Yeah this occurred to me as well. I'll make the change.
I think the text here needs fixing to allow for wildcards ending in /.
